name: Pear and Ginger Preserves
description: Sweet pears partner with spicy ginger in this seasonal fruity preserve.
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds pears, peeled, cored, and cut into 1/4-inch dice
2 tablespoons juice and 1/2 teaspoon zest from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Place pears, white sugar, brown sugar, lemon juice, lemon zest, crystallized ginger, and minced ginger in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium and continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until thickened and sauce has gelled, 20 to 30 minutes. Remove from heat.

Transfer sauce to airtight container and place in refrigerator 24 hours before using, or can by ladling jam into jars, leaving 1/4-inch headspace. Cover and process jars in boiling hot water bath for 10 minutes. Remove from water and let cool for 24 hours. Store in a cool dark place. Refrigerate after opening.
